section.p: This section contains problems that occurred during or around the time of a procedure. The complications may be known risks or unanticipated problems.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8174, CONF:1198-10384, CONF:1198-32538 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Complications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15453)/@code="55109-3" Complications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15454, CONF:1198-30860)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8795, CONF:1198-15455)
Note: When no coded entries or negation of entries are present, narrative section/text will be provided containing details of the complication(s) or that there were no complications.
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Complications Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15453)/@code="55109-3" Complications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15454, CONF:1198-30860)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8176, R2.1=CONF:1198-8176)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8177, R2.1=CONF:1198-8177)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-8795, CONF:1198-15455)
Conforms to Problem Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4:2015-08-01)
Note: When no coded entries or negation of entries are present, narrative section/text will be provided containing details of the complication(s) or that there were no complications.
There SHALL be a statement providing details of the complication(s) or it SHALL explicitly state there were no complications. (CONF:8797)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8174, CONF:10384 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.37"
Consol Complications Section There SHALL be a statement providing details of the complication(s) or it SHALL explicitly state there were no complications. (CONF:8797)
Consol Complications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15453)/@code="55109-3" Complications (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15454)
Consol Complications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:8176, R2.1=CONF:1198-8176)
Consol Complications Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:8177, R2.1=CONF:1198-8177)

Consol Complications Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8795, CONF:8796) Conforms to Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
